    Represents the level completion flag in the game.

    Represents a flying enemy that extends the behavior of a regular enemy by adding vertical movement.

    Constructs a FlyingEnemy with a specified position in the game world.
    flyingEnemyPositions - Variable in class game.core.GameState
    Coordinates of all active flying enemies at the time of saving.
    flyingTimer - Variable in class game.entities.FlyingEnemy
    A separate Timer for vertical (flying) movement.
    fontCache - Static variable in class game.util.FontManager
    A cache that stores loaded fonts by their alias names.
    FontManager - Class in game.util
    The FontManager class is responsible for loading and managing custom fonts for the game.

    frameDelay - Variable in class game.entities.Enemy
    Delay between animation frames in milliseconds.
    frameDelay - Variable in class game.entities.Player

    frameDelay - Variable in class game.util.Animation
    The delay (in milliseconds) between frame transitions.
    frames - Variable in class game.util.Animation
    An array of images (frames) used in the animation.
    friction - Variable in class game.core.PlayerController
    The friction value applied each frame when no movement key is pressed, causing the player to gradually slow down horizontally.
